info.title: Bulk Text Service Api Doc API Reference
info.description: All actions within our API service require a pre authorised access token, this can be generated from within your portal.

x-logo.altText: Bulk Text Service Api Doc API Reference

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X GET -G "https://app.dbfb.test/api/profile" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -H "Accept: application/json"

curl -X GET -G "https://app.dbfb.test/api/credits" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -H "Accept: application/json"

get.description: Get a paginated list of users from your current department. Token Permissions may prevent this from working.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X GET -G "https://app.dbfb.test/api/contacts" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -H "Accept: application/json"

post.description: Storing a contact to the system to send messages to. Token Permissions may prevent this from working.

requestBody.description: Storing a contact to the system to send messages to. Token Permissions may prevent this from working.

opt_in.description: if the customer is opted in to receive messages.

number.description: Number for customer without the +44 or first 0.

country_code.description: The country code for this number eg: 44 is UK

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "https://app.dbfb.test/api/contacts" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -H "Accept: application/json" \

    -d "opt_in"="1" \
    -d "number"="3" \
    -d "country_code"="2"

get.description: Show a specific from the current department. Token Permissions may prevent this from working.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the contact required

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X GET -G "https://app.dbfb.test/api/contacts/{id}" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -H "Accept: application/json"

put.description: update a contact to the system. Token Permissions may prevent this from working.

requestBody.description: update a contact to the system. Token Permissions may prevent this from working.

opt_in.description: if the customer is opted in to receive messages.

number.description: Number for customer without the +44 or first 0.

country_code.description: The country code for this number eg: 44 is UK

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the contact required

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X PUT "https://app.dbfb.test/api/contacts/{id}" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -H "Accept: application/json" \

    -d "opt_in"="1" \
    -d "number"="16" \
    -d "country_code"="17"

delete.description: Remove a specific from the current department. Token Permissions may prevent this from working.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the contact required

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X DELETE "https://app.dbfb.test/api/contacts/{id}" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -H "Accept: application/json"

get.description: Get a paginated list of groups from your current department. Token Permissions may prevent this from working.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X GET -G "https://app.dbfb.test/api/groups" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -H "Accept: application/json"

post.description: Creating group for contact grouping. Token Permissions may prevent this from working.

requestBody.description: Creating group for contact grouping. Token Permissions may prevent this from working.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "https://app.dbfb.test/api/group" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -H "Accept: application/json"

delete.description: Remove a specific contact group. Token Permissions may prevent this from working.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the group required

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X DELETE "https://app.dbfb.test/api/group/{id}" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -H "Accept: application/json"

post.description: Move contacts to a specific contact group. Token Permissions may prevent this from working.

requestBody.description: Move contacts to a specific contact group. Token Permissions may prevent this from working.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the group required

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "https://app.dbfb.test/api/group-contact/{groupId}" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -H "Accept: application/json"

delete.description: remove contacts from a specific contact group. Token Permissions may prevent this from working.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the group required

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X DELETE "https://app.dbfb.test/api/group-contact/{groupId}" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -H "Accept: application/json"

get.description: Get a paginated list of Departments. Token Permissions may prevent this from working.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X GET -G "https://app.dbfb.test/api/departments" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -H "Accept: application/json"

post.description: Change to a different department. Token Permissions may prevent this from working.

requestBody.description: Change to a different department. Token Permissions may prevent this from working.

departmentId.description: ID of department to change too.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "https://app.dbfb.test/api/departments/{id}" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -H "Accept: application/json" \

    -d "departmentId"="20"

get.description: Get a paginated list of users from your campaigns. Token Permissions may prevent this from working.

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X GET -G "https://app.dbfb.test/api/campaigns" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -H "Accept: application/json"

get.description: Show specific campaign information. Token Permissions may prevent this from working.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the campaign required

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X GET -G "https://app.dbfb.test/api/campaigns/{id}" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -H "Accept: application/json"

post.description: Single SMS Sending. Token Permissions may prevent this from working.

requestBody.description: Single SMS Sending. Token Permissions may prevent this from working.

name.description: The name of the campaign for referencing

number.description: Number of contact without first 0 or +44

send_date.description: Send Date of the campaign. Format d-m-Y eg: 01-12-2021

send_time.description: Send Time of the campaign. Format eg: 10:40

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "https://app.dbfb.test/api/campaign" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -H "Accept: application/json" \

    -d "name"="${tKO#1>5h0$" \
    -d "sender_id"="20" \
    -d "message"="f%,YqrMLarN/" \
    -d "country_code"="7" \
    -d "number"="2" \
    -d "send_date"="E>e8@B#,XRn-" \
    -d "send_time"="O)[Kh_Gco*,D"

post.description: Sending Bulk SMS  requires contacts to be a part of a group. Token Permissions may prevent this from working.

requestBody.description: Sending Bulk SMS  requires contacts to be a part of a group. Token Permissions may prevent this from working.

name.description: The name of the campaign for referencing

opt_out.description: Include system set opt out url

send_date.description: Send Date of the campaign. Format d-m-Y eg: 01-12-2021

send_time.description: Send Time of the campaign. Format eg: 10:40

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X POST "https://app.dbfb.test/api/campaign/bulk" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -H "Accept: application/json" \

    -d "name"="df|u8`Rx.%pG" \
    -d "group_id"="2" \
    -d "sender_id"="5" \
    -d "message"="B\wTi?e{F%k*" \
    -d "opt_out"="1" \
    -d "send_date"="xo[ls{cf%f"M" \
    -d "send_time"="|?yRXs{UvMq3"

delete.description: Remove a specific campaign. Token Permissions may prevent this from working.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the campaign required

x-code-samples.source:
curl -X DELETE "https://app.dbfb.test/api/campaign/{id}" \
    -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJod" \
    -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
    -H "Accept: application/json"
